directions.step:
To broil: Oil shallow baking pan. Arrange fillets in pan; brush steaks with melted butter. Broil 4-5" from heat source, 10-12 minutes. Season with lemon pepper & serve. To grill: Prepare grill. Allow coals to burn 30 minutes or until coated with light grey ash. Brush steaks with melted butter & cook 4-5 minutes per side.
